reqs:
Pre-reqs: THTR 399.
Co-reqs: One of THTR 405, THTR 406, THTR 407, THTR 408, THTR 450, THTR 452, THTR 454, THTR 456, THTR 470.
Students wishing to take 499A must be registered in at least ONE of the following courses in the same term:
THTR 405, 406, 407, 408, 450, 452, 454, 456, 462, 505, 506, 507, 508
description: Assigned projects in Theatre or Film design and production.
